name: Reuben
description:
Narrative permeates gameplay. If you figure out the happy ending, you will have more fun than both only narrative and only mechanism combination. There is no exact ending. Please don't wait for a long time if you guess nothing will be changed.

It is for a 3-day game jam.  The theme is "memories". An additional limitation is that "the game must start and end as different genres". It is about Reuben, and if you're an indie developer, you will get it easily.

Developer: Mike (solo)
